display.title: Buzzed
description: &&2Bees&&r provide both &&3Honeycomb&&r and &&3Honey Bottles&&r, and also &&dimprove crop growth&&r.
After crafting a &&3Beehive&&r using honeycomb from &&3Bee Nests&&r &&7(See Exploration: Naturalist)&&r, bees must be lead using &&eflowers&&r to the new hive, where they can then be bred.
Bees &&dpollinate crops&&r below them after visiting a flower. Try building your farm &&dbetween hives and flowers&&r!
Honeycomb can make &&3Candles&&r, and also &&dprevent copper blocks from aging&&r!
&&7[FeedTheBees]&&r Bees will &&donly take damage&&r to regrow their stinger. They can be fed &&3Sugar&&r to heal them.
&&7[Tinkerer's Quilt]&&r &&3Waxing&&r copper beacons will prevent expiry.
